name: nodejs-raffle
description: Node.js-Raffle by Rast Mobile is an engaging and intuitive web application designed to conduct raffles with ease and fairness. Tailored for events like New Year celebrations, this app ensures a transparent and random selection process, allowing each participant a unique chance to win. Built with Node.js and Express, it offers a streamlined user experience and a simple yet effective interface for both organizers and participants.
author: Rast Mobile <mobilerast@gmail.com>
